images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing beautiful sunsets and tropical relaxation.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight key attractions in Thailand, such as the Emerald Buddha Temple and Phuket beaches, appealing to the adventurous spirit of the audience.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting beautiful sunsets, cultural landmarks, and relaxing beach scenes in Thailand during autumn
highlighting the Emerald Buddha Temple, Phuket beaches, and Thai street food

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя экзотику Таиланда этой осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing beautiful sunsets and tropical relaxation.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
